ABOUT-ME.TEXT1: Welcome to my portfolio! Since 2022, I've been advancing my skills to become a frontend developer, also delving into backend development. My passion for software development was sparked by my years as a dental technician, where I was deeply engaged with PC and CAD technologies. These experiences ignited my interest in technology and development, motivating me to explore the field of software development.
ABOUT-ME.TEXT2: In this portfolio, I showcase various projects completed during my training, demonstrating my abilities and knowledge in frontend development. My move into software development was deliberate, fueled by strong motivation. After facing challenges in work-life balance in dental technology, I've now found a path that aligns with my professional and personal goals.

SKILLS.TEXT: I learned various front-end development skills and gained a lot of experience in different areas of front-end technologies, which enable me to create various great projects.

PROJECTS.H3: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.

CONTACT.PP-TEXT2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
